title: Best of The Program | Guests: Megyn Kelly, Emily Miller, & Mark “Oz” Geist | 9/8/21
description:
Megyn Kelly joins to discuss the trans agenda her children’s school is teaching. Journalist Emily Miller joins to talk Project Exodus’ efforts to rescue people in Afghanistan. Battle of Benghazi veteran Mark “Oz” Geist predicts what’s coming next after Biden’s Afghanistan blunder.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
